label: image 1
alt: a wood sauna with a table in the middle for coals
thetext:
A peaceful retreat tucked within the club, the Spa and Wellness Room offers a full menu of rejuvenating services, from deep-tissue massages and facials to guided meditation and holistic therapies.

Soft lighting, calming scents, and natural materials create an atmosphere of quiet luxury, where members can truly unwind and restore both body and mind.
